messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] modeling,letting your children choose and little girls...
messages.msgSnippet: ... trying to practice for half a year now and am enjoying. My question today is about my almost 11 yr olds interest in modeling. She gets people telling her
messages.messageBody:
> Hi everyone. I am relatively new to the ideas of unschooling but have been
trying to practice for half a year now and am enjoying. My question today is
about my almost 11 yr olds interest in modeling. She gets people telling her
that she shoudl be a model all the time becuase she is so tall (5'2") and
she is very pretty.

I know nothing about modeling, but keep in mind that she may well not be a
tall adult. When I was 11, I grew 6 inches, to 5'6". Then puberty arrived,
and I never grew again (other than sideways).
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
